channel.title: Legit Minecraft Clicker Need help?
channel.description: So i decided to change my ways and completely make something from scratch, Im looking for someone to help me out im making a incremental minecraft game, but im wondering if i should make it so you have to login via PHP to play the game, Or if i should just have it strictly local based.

item.title: Legit Minecraft Clicker Need help?
item.dc:creator: @Mobster92 Mobster92
item.description:
@Mobster92 wrote:

Well, all depends if you want this to have any MySQL features, would be easier for a PHP platform to have already implemented and more stable. Donations and rewards easier to track through PHP & SQL Platform with callbacks.

Read full topic
